item.title: Displaying geohash tags from a Loki datasource in a Grafana Worldmap Panel
item.description: ðŸš§ Loki v2.x Loki v2.0 included a new set of features to the query language that allows extraction of labels at query time, unlocking new possibilities. This means that previously we would need to have the geohash information as a label (which is not a great idea). Loki works best when you have a small set of labels (with no high cardinality). A geohash field is a very bad candidate for a label ðŸ™ƒ, in our defense before Loki v2.
